column5: Last fall I was told by 2 different MNR offices and an Ontario outfitter that Crown land camping permits would be available for purchase online this year. I can't find them available anywhere though, looks like they still have to be purchased in person. They sell the fishing license online but for us that's completely pointless if you still have to go to a licensing location during normal business hours to get the camping permits. We drive up through the night and end up sitting around for 2 or 3 hours in the morning until the local bait shop opens.. frustrating!
